external_references.source_name: Palo Alto Unit 42 Medusa Group Medusa Ransomware January 2024
external_references.description: Anthony Galiette, Doel Santos. (2024, January 11). Medusa Ransomware Turning Your Files into Stone. Retrieved October 15, 2025.

objects.description: [Medusa Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1051) has utilized a hard-coded security tool process list that identifies and terminates using an undocumented IOCTL code 0x222094.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 Medusa Group Medusa Ransomware January 2024)
